short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the web using this useful tool from the address bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About extension:

Default Search Adjust is an innovative browser extension designed to enhance your browsing experience on Google Chrome.
By seamlessly integrating with your address bar, this extension allows you to effortlessly search the web using the Default Search Adjust, with results provided by Bing.

Features:
With Default Search Adjust, you can effortlessly explore the web directly from your address bar.
Whether you're researching, shopping, or simply browsing, Default Search Adjust simplifies your online journey. Enjoy the convenience of typing in your search query and receiving accurate results without any extra clicks or hassle.
You can personalize your search settings to fit your preferences, ensuring a tailored browsing experience.
And if you ever decide to change your search engine of choice, uninstalling the extension is quick and easy, giving you complete control over your browser settings.
Experience the seamless integration, enhanced efficiency, and personalized browsing that Default Search Adjust brings to your Google Chrome experience. 
Try Default Search Adjust today and unlock the full potential of your browsing journey.

Useful Information:
Just start by typing preferred search term (query) into the search box. The Default Search Adjust will provide Bing SERP with proper results.
To remove the Default Search Adjust extension simply go to Google Chrome "Settings" page. Find the "Extensions" in the settings menu and there you will find Default Search Adjust extension listed.
To uninstall it just use the "Remove" button.

Permissions Requested:
No special permissions requested.

About us:
Default Search Adjust team is dedicated to creating genuine products which will be useful for our users. We tend to provide GRPR aligned products, always prioritizing users' privacy. 
Considering that, we recognize that location-sharing is a concern for many people (ourselves included) and it is a responsibility we take very seriously. For more information on privacy and the security of your data visit our Privacy policy below.

To reach our support please write us to this email: contact@searchadjust.com
For additional information please check links below:
Privacy policy:
https://www.searchadjust.com/privacy-policy.html
